sections.subtitle: Origins
sections.content: I'm not the typical developer. A long time ago, my journey began — over 20 years ago — as a young padawan discovering the early powers of visuals, motion, and detail. First came pixel-perfect layouts, smooth interactions, and interfaces that felt alive. Then came the other side — solving challenges, building integrations, and connecting systems. Some call it the dark side of development. I call it balance.

sections.subtitle: Now
sections.content: Today, I walk the path of product design — blending strategy, UX thinking and fullstack execution. It's not just about how to build — but what, why and for whom.

sections.subtitle: Forward
sections.content: Learning never stops. I stay curious, adaptable and ready for what's next. I believe in building things that last — products with purpose and tools I'd want to use myself.

portfolio.title: Plancito.com
portfolio.description: Plancito.com is a collaborative event planning app designed to make group gatherings seamless. It enables users to create events, manage invites, organize playlists via YouTube, split expenses, and coordinate tasks effortlessly.
portfolio.challenge: Designing a real-time collaborative platform that balances multiple features such as expense tracking, polls, and playlists without overwhelming the user experience.
portfolio.solution: Developed with React for the UI and Supabase for the backend, using Zustand for state management, TanStack Query for data synchronization, and Supabase Actions for YouTube video integration. Styled with TailwindCSS for a consistent and mobile-first design.

feedback.author: Deiv
feedback.text: Plancito.com reflects my passion for creating collaborative tools that make planning with friends smooth and fun.

portfolio.title: Gymstagram
portfolio.description: Gymstagram is a management platform built for personal trainers to organize and track their clients' workouts. Trainers can create and assign routines, while clients access and follow their personalized plans through a simple interface.
portfolio.challenge: Building a system that gives trainers full control of their client base and routines, while ensuring clients can seamlessly follow workouts on their own devices.
portfolio.solution: Implemented with Next.js and Node.js on the frontend/backend, using Express for the API and MongoDB for persistent data. Authentication is powered by Firebase Auth, while GitLab pipelines automate CI/CD for deployments on Vercel. Email notifications are handled via Resend.

feedback.author: Fitness Startup CEO
feedback.text: Gymstagram gave our trainers an efficient tool to manage clients and routines, improving both engagement and retention.

portfolio.title: Turnogram
portfolio.description: Turnogram is a flexible scheduling and CRM platform tailored for professionals and studios. It enables users to manage appointments, sync calendars, integrate payments, and maintain client relationships in one place.
portfolio.challenge: Creating a scalable system that supports diverse professions, handles different time zones, and integrates secure payments while keeping the booking flow simple.
portfolio.solution: Built with Astro for a fast frontend, styled with TailwindCSS and shadcn/ui components. Payments are powered by MercadoPago, with calendar sync via Google Calendar API. Authentication is managed with Firebase Auth, Turso DB stores relational data, and transactional emails are sent through Resend.

feedback.author: Turnogram Product Manager
feedback.text: Turnogram simplified our scheduling workflow and improved the overall client experience.

portfolio.title: WordPress Plugins & Headless Landings
portfolio.description: Custom WordPress plugins combined with headless landing pages for high-performance marketing. Projects included developing bespoke plugins, extending ACF features, and connecting WooCommerce with modern frontends.
portfolio.challenge: Maintaining WordPress flexibility while delivering the performance and SEO benefits of modern JavaScript frameworks.
portfolio.solution: Developed plugins in PHP and ACF to extend CMS functionality. Built decoupled frontends in React and Astro for optimized performance, faster load times, and smooth integration with marketing workflows.

feedback.author: Various Clients
feedback.text: The combination of WordPress flexibility with modern frontend performance has been a game-changer for our projects.
